ABOUT.TITLE: Greetings from Michał!
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_LINE_1: I currently work and grow as a software engineer. I'm driven by a passion for learning, discovering new possibilities, and building innovative solutions.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_LINE_2: I love trying new things and playing around with them — always looking for challenges that help me grow and develop new skills.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_LINE_3: Below you'll find tags that reflect my interests — both in tech and beyond...
